item.description:
Hi Incubators!

Another week of grusomely awesome improvisation!! Hatchets may or may not make an appearance in an imaginary form. If you don't have any idea what the heck i am talking about. it's ok, just laugh at me cause I'm silly.

Bring your smile and your friends. No improv or acting experience required. Any questions??

For this week's incubator I am posting it as the Democracy Center however if the weather clears Thursday it may change to my backyard so stay posted!

$3 suggested donation covers rental space and meetup.com costs.


I look forward to playing some fun games with you all as always. And by all means check out http://improvencyclop... and pick a game that you want to play and bring it to the incubator!!!

Cheers, peace, and prosperity,

Jason J.
item.name: Improvised Hatchet II: Old School American Comedy
